trustfund:
TF037443-NICARAGUA - NI HURRICANE RELIEF,TF036893-NICARAGUA - FIRST AND SECOND
            ROAD REHABILITATION PROJECTS

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Second
            Road Rehabilitation and Maintenance Project is to improve
            the efficiency of road transportation in Nicaragua. The
            project components are: 1) Managua - El Rama road
            rehabilitation component, sections Portezuelo - San Benito
            and Muhan - El Rama; 2) The road maintenance component
            includes the execution by contract of about 600 km of
            periodic maintenance, road rehabilitation, and spot
            improvement on selected roads; and 3) The institutional and
            training development component includes training, studies,
            technical assistance and consultant services to assist the
            Ministry of Construction and Transport (MCT): i) to prepare
            economically justified road improvement programs; ii) to
            implement the pavement management system; iii) to establish
            and operate the road maintenance fund; iv) to supervise the
            road rehabilitation works; v) strengthen the management of
            road by contract; vi) to carry out staff training and vii)
            to carry out a road safety study, reforestation study, and
            feasibility and detailed engineering studies.
